name: Sandile
flavorText:
They live buried in the sands of the
desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent
their body temperature from dropping.

previous.name: Basculin
previous.flavorText:
Red and blue Basculin get along so
poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly.
These Pokémon are very hostile.
previous.formDescription: Forms have one different ability and different wild held items.  Blue-Striped Basculin are rarer in Black Version and Black Version 2, and Red-Striped Basculin in White Version and White Version 2.

next.name: Krokorok
next.flavorText:
They live in groups of a few individuals.
Protective membranes shield their eyes
from sandstorms.

pokemon.name: Krokorok

They live in groups of a few individuals.

from sandstorms.

pokemon.name: Krookodile
pokemon.flavorText:
They never allow prey to escape.
Their jaws are so powerful, they can
crush the body of an automobile.
